title: CeBioLabs
author: CeBioLabs
created_time: July 27, 2022, 07:13:30 PMLast edit: September 30, 2022, 12:28:22 AM by CeBioLabs
content: CeBioLabs - Reshaping the Global Market for CBD and CannabisWhat is CeBioLabs? (CBSL)CeBioLabs is a collective of 3 German companies with years of experience in the fields of Cannabis, CBD and Blockchain. We will combine the Blockchain technology with the emerging Cannabis and CBD market and and actively develop and implement the following projects: unique Blockchain-based Supply Chain Management Solution for CBD and Cannabis value chains, a (decentralized) Marketplace for Cannabis and CBD producers and consumers, a Blockchain -based Platform for Certificates of Analysis (e.g. laboratory reports) of CBD and Cannabis Products, global E-Commerce Projects in the field of CBD and Cannabis as well as Research and Development activities to develop and introduce new Cannabis/CBD Technologies.Our CBSL Token will play an important role as the link between all our products. Only CBSL will be available to companies to pay the usage fees for our B2B solutions and services. We are planning numerous global paid services and products for companies, which is why the CBSL Token will have an important benefit for our network. private holders of CBSL can also benefit from numerous advantages such as free products, exclusive offers or using CBSL as a payment method in some of our CBD and Cannabis shops. Any CBSL paid to us as usage fees will be locked for a minimum of 3 years! We will also use 10% of all profits from the company CeBiol GmbH (part of the CeBioLabs collective) for CBSL Buybacks and Token-Burns!Website| Whitepaper | Blog | Telegram | Announcements | TwitterOur Vision:We want to make the global market for CBD and cannabis more transparent and offer all market participants more transparency and higher quality. To do this, we will develop blockchain-based solutions for the market.1. Supply Chain Management: "CeBioLabs SCM", a Blockchain-based Solution to manage Cannabis and CBD Value Chains.2. Decentralized Marketplace: "CBSL Marketplace", a Global Marketplace for CBD and Cannabis Products.3. Certificate of Authenticity Portal: Development of a Blockchain-based CoA Portal for CBD and Cannabis Products.4. E-Commerce Business: Launch of global E-Commerce Projects to generate Operational Revenue.5. Research and Development: Research in the field of CBD and Cannabis to Develop innovative Products.Who is behind CeBioLabs?:CeBioLabs is a collective of three companies registered in Germany. The CeBiol Blockchain Solutions GmbH, CeBiol GmbH and getViews Consulting UG are the companies that work with all their employees and resources on the CeBioLabs project.What is CeBioLabs (CBSL) Token?The CeBioLabs (CBSL) Token is based on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). Our company will develop B2B solutions for the international CBD and cannabis market. CBSL will serve as the sole payment method for our paid B2B solutions and systems.Name: CeBioLabs | Ticker: CBSL | Type: Utility Token | Standard: BEP20 | Total Supply: 100,000,000 CBSL | Registration Country: GermanyCBSL Features1. Regulatory Verified Utility Token: A Legal Self-Assessment prepared for the CBSL Token by a German Law Firm was Reviewed by the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority and CBSL will be Classified as a Utility Token. 2. CBSL will be Used in our B2B Solutions:Companies can only Pay the Usage Fees for our B2B Solutions in CBSL Tokens. This Tokens will be Locked for 3 Years. This Gives CBSL a Great Added Value. Holders of CBSL can also Benefit from Many Benefits. 3. Used CBSL will be Locked for 3 Years:Our B2B Solutions and Products are associated with Usage Fees, which we Accept Exclusively as CBSL. The CBSL Tokens paid by the Companies as Usage Fees will be Locked by us for 3 Years. 4. Direct Buyback and Burn Mechanism:10% of the Profits of the German Company CeBiol GmbH (part of the CeBioLabs Collective) will be used for CBSL Buybacks. All these CBSL Tokens will be Immediately Burned.CBSL is a Regulatory Verified TokenCeBioLabs is a large-scale, long-term, and strategic project that underwent an extensive review that lasted several months. The German law firm for financial and capital law "von FERBER ' LANGER" has been accompanying the CeBioLabs project from the very beginning. The law firm prepared a legal assessment of the entire project and submitted it to the German Federal Financial Authority. After an intensive review lasting several weeks, the German Federal Financial Authority confirmed the legal assessment with regard to the regulatory classification of the CBSL token. The German Federal Financial Authority also comes to the conclusion that the CBSL Token neither embodies rights similar to securities nor is to be classified as an investment. According to this assessment, the issuance of the CBSL Token is not subject to a prospectus. The CBSL Token is a freely tradable utility token.ICO will start on August 1st, 2022Our ICO will start shortly and will consist of three phases:Phase 1: 10,000,000 CBSL for $0.09 USD (10% discount)Phase 2: 7,500,000 CBSL for $0,095 (5% discount)Phase 3: 7,500,000 CBSL for $0.10 (no discount)A pre- and private sale takes place before the first phase.Token Distribution will take place on September 26th, 2022.All further information can be found on our website: https://cebiolabs.ioUpdate: The ICO registrations have started: https://cebiolabs.io/icoUpdate: ICO Completed and CBSL Launched: https://cebiolabs.io/ico-results/

comments.author: Alfredbolk
comments.body: Your project seems really interesting. But I do have a question. There is few similar project, What is your strategy to compete with others?

comments.author: joebic541
comments.body: Where you based on ? Is that your platform can only be used where it is located?

We will combine the Blockchain technology with the emerging Cannabis and CBD market and and actively develop and implement the following projects: unique Blockchain-based Supply Chain Management Solution for CBD and Cannabis value chains, a (decentralized) Marketplace for Cannabis and CBD producers and consumers, a Blockchain -based Platform for Certificates of Analysis (e.g. laboratory reports) of CBD and Cannabis Products, global E-Commerce Projects in the field of CBD and Cannabis as well as Research and Development activities to develop and introduce new Cannabis/CBD Technologies.Our CBSL Token will play an important role as the link between all our products. Only CBSL will be available to companies to pay the usage fees for our B2B solutions and services. We are planning numerous global paid services and products for companies, which is why the CBSL Token will have an important benefit for our network. private holders of CBSL can also benefit from numerous advantages such as free products, exclusive offers or using CBSL as a payment method in some of our CBD and Cannabis shops. Any CBSL paid to us as usage fees will be locked for a minimum of 3 years! comments.author: CeBioLabs
comments.created_time: July 31, 2022, 01:09:50 AMLast edit: August 01, 2022, 12:16:25 AM by CeBioLabs
comments.body: Quote from: Alfredbolk on July 30, 2022, 04:08:32 PMYour project seems really interesting. But I do have a question. There is few similar project, What is your strategy to compete with others?Hello Alfredbolk, thanks for your question.Our company (CeBiol Blockchain Solutions GmbH) and the CeBioLabs project consist of a total of three German companies. One of them is CeBiol GmbH. As a seller of CBD products, CeBiol GmbH has been on the market since 2018 and knows the market with all its weaknesses and problems.This is exactly our advantage, because we know exactly what the weaknesses of the market and can tailor our solutions accordingly.Other points that distinguish us from other projects are:- Our CBSL token was checked by the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority and classified as a utility token- 3 German companies are behind the project and will develop blockchain-based products for the CBD and cannabis market- Enterprises need to buy CBSL token to pay usage fees for our solutions. This means that the CBSL token has real utility.- We carry out buybacks and burns of CBSL tokens with the financial means of CeBiol GmbH (with 10% of the annual profit) and with the sales of our e-commerce projects.

comments.author: CeBioLabs
comments.body: Quote from: joebic541 on July 30, 2022, 06:36:02 PMWhere you based on ? Is that your platform can only be used where it is located? Hello joebic541, thanks for your question.Our company (CeBiol Blockchain Solutions GmbH) is based in Hamburg, Germany. We address the global market with our blockchain-based solutions for CBD and cannabis products. Thus, providers and traders of CBD and cannabis solutions worldwide will be able to use our solutions. There are no geographic restrictions.

comments.author: ADAM Alams
comments.body: Promising project hopefully successful.I am interested to participate to this project, waiting for the bounty campaign. good luck team.

comments.body: How can I know more about CeBioLabs team?

(CBSL)CeBioLabs is a collective of 3 German companies with years of experience in the fields of Cannabis, CBD and Blockchain. We will combine the Blockchain technology with the emerging Cannabis and CBD market and and actively develop and implement the following projects: unique Blockchain-based Supply Chain Management Solution for CBD and Cannabis value chains, a (decentralized) Marketplace for Cannabis and CBD producers and consumers, a Blockchain -based Platform for Certificates of Analysis (e.g. laboratory reports) of CBD and Cannabis Products, global E-Commerce Projects in the field of CBD and Cannabis as well as Research and Development activities to develop and introduce new Cannabis/CBD Technologies.Our CBSL Token will play an important role as the link between all our products. Only CBSL will be available to companies to pay the usage fees for our B2B solutions and services. Any CBSL paid to us as usage fees will be locked for a minimum of 3 years! We will also use 10% of all profits from the company CeBiol GmbH (part of the CeBioLabs collective) for CBSL Buybacks and Token-Burns!What is the minimum investment I can make? Can I make investment form USA?Hello Jeebshub, thanks for your questions.The smallest quantity that can be purchased is currently defined as 500 CBSL. The equivalent value would be 0.15408 BNB. No, on the advice of our lawyers we have decided to exclude US citizens and holders of US green cards. These investor groups is not allowed to participate in the ICO.

comments.author: Alex1326
comments.body: CeBioLabs team is seems very experienced .The success of ico and the project depends on the team, and CeBioLabs team seems to be strong enough to become successful.

comments.author: CeBioLabs
comments.body: Quote from: Bushadamfus on July 31, 2022, 08:35:35 AMHow can I know more about CeBioLabs team?Hello, thanks for your question.CeBioLabs is a collective and consists of a total of 3 companies. All companies are based in Germany and some have been registered since 2013. CeBiol Blockchain Solutions GmbH is the legal company behind CeBioLabs. In addition, CeBiol GmbH (active in the field of CBD trading since 2018) and getViews Consulting UG (active since 2013) are also involved in CeBioLabs. All companies have provided 5 to 10 employees just for CeBioLabs and are actively involved in projects.
